compatibility.notes: Saxpath is a permissive license, allowing for wide compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Include a copy of the license in all redistributions.
Acknowledge the SAXPath Project in documentation or software.
license.name: Saxpath
obligations: Retain copyright notice and conditions in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and conditions in binary redistributions.
Obtain prior written permission to use the name 'SAXPath' for endorsement or promotion.
Obtain prior written permission to use 'SAXPath' in the name of derived products.
